pkgmetadata.longdescription: Credible Subsets // Functions for constructing simultaneous credible bands and identifying subsets via the "credible subsets" (also called "credible subgroups") method. Package documentation includes the vignette included in this package, and the paper by Schnell, Fiecas, and Carlin (2020, doi:10.18637/jss.v094.i07).
